smile.data

Class IndexDataFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.data.IndexDataFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<BaseVector>, DataFrame, Dataset<Tuple>

    public class IndexDataFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataFrame
    A data frame with a new index instead of the default [0, n) row index.

      • toArray

        public double[][] toArray()
        Description copied from interface: DataFrame
        Return an array obtained by converting all the variables in a data frame to numeric mode and then binding them together as the columns of a matrix. Nominal and ordinal variables are replaced by their internal codes. Missing values/nulls will be encoded as Double.NaN.
        Specified by:
        toArray in interface DataFrame

      • toMatrix

        public DenseMatrix toMatrix()
        Description copied from interface: DataFrame
        Return a matrix obtained by converting all the variables in a data frame to numeric mode and then binding them together as the columns of a matrix. Nominal and ordinal variables are replaced by their internal codes. Missing values/nulls will be encoded as Double.NaN.
        Specified by:
        toMatrix in interface DataFrame
